sourcesContent:
import { AddCircle } from '@mui/icons-material'
import { Box, Fab, Modal, styled, Tooltip, Typography } from '@mui/material'
import React,{useState} from 'react'
import { Add as AddIcon } from '@mui/icons-material'

const Add = () => {

    const [open, setOpen] = useState(false);

    const StyledModal=styled(Modal)({
        display:"flex",
        alignItems:"center",
        justifyContent:"center",
    })
  return (
    <>
        <Tooltip onClick={(e)=>setOpen(true)} title="Add" sx={{position:"fixed", bottom:20, left:{xs:"calc(50%-25px)",md:30}}}>
            <Fab color='primary' aria-label='add'>
                <AddIcon />
            </Fab>
        </Tooltip>
        <StyledModal
            open={open}
            onClose={(e)=>setOpen(false)}
            aria-labelledby="modal-modal-title"
            aria-describedby="modal-modal-description"
            >
            <Box width={400} height={400} sx={{bgcolor:"white",p:5,borderRadius:10}}>
               Hello
            </Box>
        </StyledModal>
    </>
  )
}

export default Add
